message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $15000. This is a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item at a competitive price. Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13000 is still higher than what I can comfortably spend. I'm sticking with my original offer of $10000. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to take my business elsewhere.
